markdown: | rewardname2 = | reward2 = | rewardname3 = | reward3 = | rewardname4 = | reward4 = | rewardname5 = | reward5 = | rewardname6 = | reward6 = | prev = | conc = | internalname = BOUNTY_TSK_Pirate_03 | guid = e0d37395-52ef-491b-928c-b29241dd07bb }} '''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [bounty](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireQuestsBounties/) in {{poe2}}. ## Synopsis [Dessiral](/dessiral/) wants the Watcher to confront Katrenn, the Firebrand's wizard, and end her life. ## Walkthrough * [Katrenn](/katrenn/) is found in [The Sacred Stair](/theSacredStair/) after nightfall (hour 20), near the south-western edge of the Temple of Magran. She's accompanied by two [Ironclad construct](/ironcladConstruct/)s, and an additional [Steelclad construct](/steelcladConstruct/), so the fight can be quite tough. Note that using area of effect attacks easily draws the ire of the NPCs passing through the area, so exercise caution. * Once Katrenn and her metal friends are dead, grab her [head](/katrennsHead/) as proof, as well as the unique flail [Endre's Flog of Obedience](/endresFlogOfObedience/), and a curious [map fragment](/katrennsMapFragment/). Return to Dessiral to complete the quest. ## Journal {| class="wikitable" ! colspan="3" style="word-break:break-all" | Quests/Bounties/BOUNTY_TSK_Pirate_03.quest |- ! width="40px" | {{tooltip|ID|Objectives: 0, Descriptions: 10000, Addenda: 20000, End states: 30000, Alternate descriptions: 40000}} ! colspan="2" | Objectives |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''0''' | colspan="2" | '''Bounty - Katrenn''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10000 | Dessiral wants me to confront Katrenn, the Firebrand's wizard, and end her life. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''1''' | colspan="2" | '''Confront Katrenn.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10001 | Travel to the Sacred Stair in Neketaka and kill Katrenn. She only frequents the district at night. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''2''' | colspan="2" | '''Return to Dessiral.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10002 | Return to Dessiral at Radiant Court in Dunnage and claim the reward for Katrenn's death. |- ! colspan="3" | Unused strings |- | rowspan="1" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''-''' | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 30001 | |- ! colspan="3" | End states |- | style="text-align:center" | {{check}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30000 | I killed Katrenn and claimed the bounty reward from Dessiral. |}

She's accompanied by two [[Ironclad construct]]s, and an additional [[Steelclad construct]], so the fight can be quite tough. Note that using area of effect attacks easily draws the ire of the NPCs passing through the area, so exercise caution. * Once Katrenn and her metal friends are dead, grab her [[Katrenn's Head|head]] as proof, as well as the unique flail [[Endre's Flog of Obedience]], and a curious [[Katrenn's Map Fragment|map fragment]]. Return to Dessiral to complete the quest. ==Journal== {| class="wikitable" ! colspan="3" style="word-break:break-all" | Quests/Bounties/BOUNTY_TSK_Pirate_03.quest |- ! width="40px" | {{tooltip|ID|Objectives: 0, Descriptions: 10000, Addenda: 20000, End states: 30000, Alternate descriptions: 40000}} ! colspan="2" | Objectives |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''0''' | colspan="2" | '''Bounty - Katrenn''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10000 | Dessiral wants me to confront Katrenn, the Firebrand's wizard, and end her life. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''1''' | colspan="2" | '''Confront Katrenn.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10001 | Travel to the Sacred Stair in Neketaka and kill Katrenn. She only frequents the district at night. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''2''' | colspan="2" | '''Return to Dessiral.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10002 | Return to Dessiral at Radiant Court in Dunnage and claim the reward for Katrenn's death. |- ! colspan="3" | Unused strings |- | rowspan="1" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''-''' | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 30001 | |- ! colspan="3" | End states |- | style="text-align:center" | {{check}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30000 | I killed Katrenn and claimed the bounty reward from Dessiral. |}
